item.name: config
item.item: Name shown in breadcrumbs navigation and page title.

item.name: config
item.item: Create a new front-end page for the contact form.

item.name: config
item.item: URL key of the contact form page. Example: http://www.domain.com/{prefix}/{urlkey}{suffix}

item.name: config
item.item: Form submissions are saved in the back-end.

item.name: config
item.item: Custom prefix used for form submission reference IDs, for example RMA. Leave empty to use the form ID.

item.name: config
item.item: Text shown in the form title bar.

item.name: config
item.item: Position of the form field labels.

item.name: config
item.item:
Thank you for contacting us!

We have received your message and will get in touch with you shortly.
Message shown when the form has been successfully submitted.

item.name: config
item.item: Custom CSS rules (excluding style HTML tags).

item.name: config
item.item: Javascript to be executed on page load.

item.name: config
item.item: Javascript to be executed before form submission, for example manipulating some input field values.

item.name: config
item.item: Javascript to be executed on form submission, for example a Google Analytics tracking event.

item.name: config
item.item: Notify customers per e-mail when their form is submitted.

item.name: config
item.item: Leave empty to use the form submission value from the input fields with ID "name" or "firstname" + "lastname" (if available).

item.name: config
item.item: Leave empty to use the form submission value from the input field with ID "email" (if available).

item.name: config
item.item: Send a copy of the customer notification to this e-mail address / comma-separated list.

item.name: config
item.item: Leave empty to use the default configuration.

item.name: config
item.item: Leave empty to use the default configuration.

item.name: config
item.item: Leave empty to use the default configuration.

item.name: config
item.item:
Dear {{var name}},

Thank you for contacting us!
We have received your message and will get in touch with you shortly.

Request details

{{var submission_overview}}

If you have any other questions in the mean time, feel free to contact us by phone on {{config path="general/store_information/phone"}} or by e-mail at {{config path="trans_email/ident_general/email"}}.

Best regards,
{{config path="trans_email/ident_general/name"}}
The content of the customer notification e-mail.

item.name: config
item.item: Notify admins per e-mail when a form is submitted.

item.name: config
item.item: Leave empty to use the default configuration.

item.name: config
item.item: Send a copy of the admin notification to this e-mail address / comma-separated list.

item.name: config
item.item: Leave empty to use the default configuration.

item.name: config
item.item: Leave empty to use the default configuration.

item.name: config
item.item: The recipient of replies to admin notifications. To directly reply to customers, use the ID of the e-mail address input field, for example {{var email}}.

item.name: config
item.item: Leave empty to use the default configuration.

item.name: config
item.item:
New contact request

Request details

{{var submission_overview}}

{{var uploaded_file_links}}
The content of the admin notification e-mail.
